name: Growout
description:
Growout | Ludum Dare 52

Picking flowers and dig up weed

How to play

Choose the right tool to harvest ether weed or flowers. Flowers give one point per stage. If you use the wrong tool to pick the flowers you loose on point per stage of flower. One a flower is fully grown and you missed to pick it, it will turn into weed. The plots grow faster and faster. Once all plots are filled with weed, you loose.

Game created by CaptaiinMz and ThePW for Ludum Dare 52 with the theme "Harvest". All assets created by us.

Note: Only works in Chromium Browsers

We started late and only had 5 hours, please be nice :)
